page.title: 06LIFE STYLES-HOW CHANGED
page.content: We interviewed{four}elderly people who have lived in the village for a long time. They agreed that the {population}of the village had {increased},but not in the surrounding area. The{clothes}are very{different. Women wore longer skirts.{Spare time activities have{changed.}"Now we have television,but we used to have to make our own entertainment."Food is similar ,potatoes,vegetables and meat,but it was{cheaper}before. The{jobs}used to be different.The{milkmen}came by horse and float,a man came selling cotton,needles and tape,a{hardware man came,a{baker}came and the{roads}were {swept}everyday.Cleaning{tools}have changed,now we have{hoovers.}People with{cars}find{shopping}easier,but it is harder for those without.Transport is worse now.There used to be{trains and{more buses.
